title: Maid of Honor
name: Christine Sigua
bio: Best friends since 4. Florida State alum (Boo!); matchmaker of the these two future newlyweds.

title: Matron of Honor
name: Christine Layog
bio: Oldest of the Sarmientos & mother of the most beautiful baby, Miles; busy saving lives while you are at home.

title: Bridesmaid
name: Caroline Sarmiento
bio: The little sister. Sassiness level to the Nth degree. Queen of arts & crafts and is responsible for most of the wedding decor.

title: Bridesmaid
name: Cindy Nguyen
bio: The high school best friend..excuse me, that's Dr. Nguyen to you. The most unique, yet sweetest person you will ever meet.

title: Bridesmaid
name: Mia Real
bio: The college bestie. Your favorite yelp elitist. Fellow lover of chocolate and everything sweet.

title: Bridesmaid
name: Sabrina Chan-Pong
bio: The best friend to my best friend. Lover & baker of anything bread; encourages alcoholic consumtion despite her own allergic restrictions.

title: Bridesmaid
name: Veronica Nunez
bio: Future doctor & proud nerd; would travel to the Shire if possible, but settles for Disney World instead; thinks Glinda is an actual Animal Crossing character.
